quotes.name: HAL
quotes.quote: I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that.

quotes.name: Parker
quotes.quote: It's a robot! Ash is a goddamned robot!

quotes.name: Judge Elihu Smails
quotes.quote: Danny, I'm having a party this weekend. How would you like to come over and mow my lawn?

quotes.name: Ian Malcolm
quotes.quote: Boy, do I hate being right all the time.

quotes.name: Prot
quotes.quote: I'm an alien. Don't worry, I'm not going to leap out of your chest
